domain_terms.Authentication: Process of verifying the identity of a user, device, or system
domain_terms.Authorization: Process of granting or denying access to resources based on identity
domain_terms.Encryption: Cryptographic transformation of data to prevent unauthorized access
domain_terms.Security Controls: Safeguards or countermeasures to protect confidentiality, integrity, and availability
domain_terms.Threat Modeling: Structured process for identifying and prioritizing potential security threats
domain_terms.Zero Trust: Security model assuming no implicit trust regardless of network location

framework_description: API security, encryption, authentication, authorization, secrets management, and security controls
v2_domain_features:
- Replaced old simple sections with 8 comprehensive LAS requirements
- LAS1: API Exposure (4 subsections, 10 data points)
- LAS2: Intra-Microservices Communication (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LAS3: Data Encryption (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LAS4: Container Security (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LAS5: Secrets Management (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LAS6: Authentication & Authorization (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LAS7: Deployment Security (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LAS8: Logging & Auditing (2 subsections, 4 data points)
